Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: GPSControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that includes the GPS features.
Category.Description: Category that includes the GPS features.

Category.Name: GenerateMapControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device Generate Map control.
Category.Description: Category for Device Generate Map control.

Category.Name: Support
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the support features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the support features.

Category.Name: CoaXPress
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the CoaXPress features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the CoaXPress features.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

Float.Name: DeviceWarningTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Device Warning temperature in degrees Celsius (C).
Float.Description: Device Warning temperature in degrees Celsius (C).

Float.Name: SetSensorTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Set Sensor target temperature in degrees Celsius (C).
Float.Description: Set Sensor target temperature in degrees Celsius (C).

Enumeration.Name: FanAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Fan speed auto contral by camera.
Enumeration.Description: Fan speed auto contral by camera.

Integer.Name: FanSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Fan control of the camera rejection of heat.
Integer.Description: Fan control of the camera rejection of heat.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is sent by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is sent by the device.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition. It represents all the informations provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter but combined in one single value.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: Binning
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration controls the horizontal and vertical binning setting.

Integer.Name: BlackLevel
Integer.Description: This value sets the camera's black level.

Enumeration.Name: DSNU
Enumeration.ToolTip: Deal with the image dark noise.
Enumeration.Description: Deal with the image dark noise.

Enumeration.Name: PRNU
Enumeration.ToolTip: Deal with the image light noise.
Enumeration.Description: Deal with the image light noise.

Enumeration.Name: DefectPixelCorrection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Deal with the image hot noise.
Enumeration.Description: Deal with the image hot noise.

Enumeration.Name: HorizontalFlip
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration controls the horizontal Reverse setting.

Enumeration.Name: TimeStamp
Enumeration.ToolTip: set the data at the start of image.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the switch of the data at the start of image.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionExpTime
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the camera's exposure time in us
Integer.Description: This value sets the camera's exposure time in us.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionTrigMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TrigEdge
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation polarity of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation polarity of the trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TrigExpType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.

Integer.Name: TrigDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in ms to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Integer.Description: Specifies the delay in us to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Integer.Name: TrigOutputDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in us to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Integer.Description: Specifies the delay in us to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Enumeration.Name: GpsLatitudeRef
Enumeration.ToolTip: GPS Latitude of north or south.
Enumeration.Description: GPS Latitude of north or south.

Enumeration.Name: GpsLongitudeRef
Enumeration.ToolTip: GPS Longitude of east or west.
Enumeration.Description: GPS Longitude of east or west.

Integer.Name: GpsTime
Integer.ToolTip: Curent Time of the GPS machine.
Integer.Description: Curent Time of the GPS machine.

Integer.Name: GpsTrigStartTime
Integer.ToolTip: Set Trigger Start Time of the GPS machine.
Integer.Description: Set Trigger Start Time of the GPS machine.

Integer.Name: GpsTrigFrameNumber
Integer.ToolTip: Set Trigger number of the GPS machine.
Integer.Description: Set Trigger number of the GPS machine.

Integer.Name: GpsTrigIntervalTime
Integer.ToolTip: set the GPS Acquisition Interval Time.
Integer.Description: set the GPS Acquisition Interval Time.

Command.Name: ConnectionReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state.

Category.Name: Updata
Category.ToolTip: Sets the updata mode of the device.
Category.Description: Sets the updata mode of the device.
